overview: Be prepared to be blown away! The kung-fu cop Tommy Vu (Matt Gates) is organized crimes' worst nightmare. Watch as he battles against the worlds biggest super villain crime boss Jimmy Tong (Peter Chow) and his henchmen Bobby (Darcy Marchinkow) and Wook-Bust-Ya Balls (Dave Sukic). Jam packed with blazing action and special effects. KUNG-FU COP is an exhilirating mix of non-stop action and gut-busting comedy.
tagline: Not to be missed, non-stop action and adventure
title: Kung-Fu Cop
